summary.para: Contains a class which is intended to invoke the ChartControl designer.
The Chart Designer used to design a chart at runtime.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Charts.Designer.ChartDesigner.#ctor(DevExpress.Xpf.Charts.ChartControl)

summary.para: Creates a Chart Designer for the specified chart control.

member.param: A object that is a chart control for which a chart designer is created.

summary.para: Closes the chart designer with the chart currently being edited.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Charts.Designer.ChartDesigner.Show(System.Windows.Window,DevExpress.Xpf.Core.Theme,DevExpress.Charts.Designer.DesignerWindowKind)

summary.para: Invokes the Chart Designer dialog with specified parameters.

member.param: The object specifying the parent window for the Chart Designer dialog.
The theme to be applied to the designer.
member.returns: true if an end-user modifies the chart within the Chart Designer and saves changes; otherwise false.

summary.para: Lists values that specify the Chart Designer kind.
The Chart Designer with the Toolbar.
The Chart Designer with the Ribbon.
